subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.

------=_NextPart_000_0250_01C9D954.1576D780

"Probably not "directly", since that would mean grandma would have to have =
quite an understanding of digital encoding, including which bits mean what,=
 when, and where."

Not necessarily-maybe it is that just by trying to comm=
unicate through our equipment, it happens automatically. They don't have to=
 realize that they are manipulating the EMF to make it occur, it just happe=
ns. It's the nature of being of pure energy.

  ----- Original Message ----=
- 
  From: Rj 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 20=
09 1:55 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.






        Pr=
obably not "directly", since that would mean grandma would have to have qui=
te an understanding of digital encoding, including which bits mean what, wh=
en, and where.  But even on a digital recorder, there is still an analog el=
ement (the Analog to Digital converter) which takes the sound pressure wave=
s, as represented by some analog electronic detection element, and converts=
 that into digital.  That way, long departed uncle Ebenezer does not need t=
o do anything digital.  Under this scenario, if sound is not being heard in=
 the room, but is being induced into the circuitry, then it would be round =
about that AtoD converter (assuming it isn't other just plain old noise in =
the digital elements).  

        Someone with more electronic know-how tha=
n me might be able to better pinpoint the area in the analog portion of tha=
t AtoD pipeline where it would be most likely it could be influenced by, sa=
y, an EM field, and that would also occur in a normal analog tape recorder.=


         
        --- On Wed, 5/20/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercromb=
ieghostresearch.com> wrote:


          From: April Abercrombie <april@aber=
crombieghostresearch.com>
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a que=
stion.
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Wednesday, May=
 20, 2009, 12:29 PM



          This is what I think true EVP is Eric. Not=
 and actual sound emitting a sound wave in the environment, but EMF manipul=
ation in order to imprint the message directly to the recording media. It d=
oesn't matter if it is analog or digital.

          If the sound that is r=
ecorded emitted a sound wave in the physical environment, then it is really=
 a disembodied voice, and not true EVP.

            ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
            From: Eric VanDuzer 
            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s .com 
            Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:16 AM
            Subj=
ect: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.


            Actually that I wou=
ld buy into  But the question I have when you say "tape" are you talking ol=
d analog tape or digi recording.  Here is the reason I believe it can be do=
 "real-time".  As you all know we use electromagnetic Field detectors in fi=
eld investigations.  If a spirit can manipulate that with to show that they=
 are there by giving off a EM field whose to say they can't manipulate a ma=
gnetic strip of a tape or even the electronics in a Digi recorder to speak =
in "real-time".



            On Wed, May 20, 2009 at 1:01 PM, Kristin Mor=
ris <ckmorris95@sbcgloba l.net> wrote:





              Okay I have anoth=
er one for you to think about.. I tape a session and review it later..  eve=
n a day later.  Upon review the message that comes over is about something =
that =E2=80=98just happened=E2=80=99 while I was reviewing or happened afte=
r taping?  Is it possible that spirit can manipulate the recording AFTER re=
cording has stopped or even manipulate the audio while reviewing?



      =
        An give you an example of this I was recording one day and I review=
ed the audio the next day.  While reviewing =E2=80=93 about half way throug=
h =E2=80=93 the message =E2=80=9CYour mother is calling=E2=80=9D was found.=
  I saved it and moved on and within two seconds my mom called.  You say it=
 is a coincidence except that I hadn=E2=80=99t spoken to my mother in over =
a year.  During this same conversation with her =E2=80=93 we sorta made ame=
nds and I told her the story of the =E2=80=98secret=E2=80=99 I had found ou=
t about a family member having a child out of wedlock in the late 1920s.  Q=
uick backstory.. I found out about this out-of-wedlock birth through my gen=
ealogy research and contacted spirit through the box and I was promptly tol=
d to keep it secret and which I promised to do=E2=80=A6



              We=
ll in this conversation with my mom after not speaking for a year I told he=
r what I had found out.  When the telephone conversation ended with my mom=
=E2=80=A6 I was amazed that the recording had told me she would call right =
be fore she did =E2=80=93 even though the audio was recorded the previous d=
ay.  I proceeded to go back to reviewing the audio and the very first thing=
 I heard was:  THAT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE A SECRET =E2=80=93 YOU LIED.



    =
          Maybe they can manipulate =E2=80=98real-time=E2=80=99 literally??=
? ?



              k




------------------------------------------------=
------------------

              From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mailto:EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups .com] On Behalf Of April Abercrombie
              Sent: =
Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:36 AM 


              To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .=
com

              Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.









 =
             2 different things happening-that' s why. When you get EVP tha=
t everyone understands,  it is outward, in the environment. Not a communica=
tion through subconscious means.



              EVP that people swear the=
y hear, but noone else can make sense, may be a message to them via subcons=
cious means. That isn't to say that ALL EVP's like this are true messages, =
I am sure alot are just matrixing.



              But then that is how th=
e art of scrying starts-matrixing. Like the Rorschach tests. The images you=
 matrix with those gives the psychologist an insight into your mind.



   =
           By gazing into a dark, reflective surface, you start to see clou=
dy images. At first, you will just be matrixing faces in the clouds and not=
 getting much substance. Try it, you will see what I am saying. With practi=
ce, you start to see clear, concise images.



              I think that i=
s what happening with audio as well.



              We already know for a=
 fact pareidolia can occur in audio as well as visual stimulus.



        =
        ----- Original Message ----- 

                From: Eric VanDuzer =


                To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 

                Sent: Wedn=
esday, May 20, 2009 10:19 AM

                Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I =
have a question.



                yes I understand its personal to that p=
articular individual but why can't I hear it.  I have gotten some very pers=
onal EVPs through the traditional investigation way (not through a box or a=
nything of that matter) that all others have heard.

                On Wed=
, May 20, 2009 at 12:15 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresea=
rch. com> wrote:



                "If one person is not meant to hear it =
they won't hear it (I guess I am not quite ready to believe that one right =
yet)." 



                I don't know for sure about that one either, but=
 I am not ready to discount it either, especially since I stumbled across t=
he possibility of audible scrying. But I am sure alot of people don't belie=
ve in scrying at all either.



                What makes it a possibility=
 to me is that so many people are hearing things that are very personal, bu=
t stuff they would not have come up with on their own.





               =
   ----- Original Message ----- 

                  From: Eric VanDuzer 

 =
                 To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 

                  Sent: Wed=
nesday, May 20, 2009 10:09 AM

                  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re:=
 I have a question.



                  I think that is the problem I am h=
aving though Jim.  When you say "work them over till you hear them"  to me =
I should not have to work them over till I hear them.  Yes taking out the a=
mbient and background noise is one thing.  But if you just keep on listenin=
g to them with different enhancements you are bound to hear something (matr=
ixing).  If one person is not meant to hear it they won't hear it (I guess =
I am not quite ready to believe that one right yet).  I think you all know =
what I am getting at.  

                  On Tue, May 19, 2009 at 9:11 PM,=
 James W. Hyslope <clockdryve@yahoo. com> wrote:



                  Well,=
 for myself...I don't "clean" them up to much because I really don't know H=
OW :) (well a little bit)Since I've only been at it for a couple weeks. BUT=
 if you can clean up something to where you can FIND what was there to begi=
n with "you have done no harm" I hear alot more than others I guess, and I =
haven't enhanced many of my evp's.*If anyone is able to clean them up...I D=
O promise you will hear what I say is correct)Pretty BOLD statement, but if=
 you are able to clean it up with better software (please do for others too=
) I will be more than happy to "listen" where I made a mistake...I can only=
 LEARN from it :) I have done some DEEP enhancements to a few of my evp's..=
.from the begining I could only hear clicks and thumps.....but after messin=
g with that area, eventually I would hear the true voices (and can tell if =
male or female...approximat e age) and understand the mood also....these wh=
ere extreamly modified, and I feel that I could NOT have added enough "simp=
le" enhancements that would ADD a voice....full of emotion and distinct syl=
lables :) And some just can't hear them for what ever reason be it equipmen=
t that is used to hear (pc-headphones- speakers- ears) know one has the per=
fect match of all these things. Check out "Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's" in the file=
s section....work them over till you hear them. I really can't do much more=
 :)--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, Eric VanDuzer <evanduzer@.. .> wrote:
 =
                 >
                  > Now I may be biased to the "investig=
ation" way of doing things. I do clean
                  > up evps if I hea=
r something and can't make it out do to ambient noise. So
                 =
 > hear is my question. When do you stop cleaning up? Wouldn't to much
    =
              > enhancing "taint" the results? To me the more enhancing you=
 do the less
                  > convincing it becomes. I hope noone finds =
this offensive, it is not meant
                  > to be I am just really =
curious. The way I look at it is that if you have to
                  > do=
 so much enhancing to find anything, was there really something there to
  =
                > begin with. Are we just making ourselves believe there is=
 something there??
                  > 
                  > Eric
          =
        >
